articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Early review thoughts from our first days with the gaming system
articles.description: A review in progress with multiple perspectives from the Engadget team.
articles.content: Now that most of us have managed to acquire our Switch 2, it's time to get playing. I mean, testing. The Nintendo Switch 2 became available in stores yesterday and started shipping out to those who got their pre-orders in. Those who pre-ordered via W... [3642 chars]

articles.title: Live updates: Transgender troops face deadline to voluntarily leave the military
articles.description: As part of Donald Trump's push to uproot DEI efforts, transgender military service members have until Friday to voluntarily leave or face involuntary separation.
articles.content:
A social media account run by recently terminated staffers of the U.S. aid agency that Elon Musk helped destroy had parting words for Musk Friday after his public falling-out with President Donald Trump.

articles.title: 2 terrorists killed after intense fire exchange in Balochistan’s Kachhi district: ISPR
articles.description: Military’s media wing says weapons and ammunition also recovered from the terrorists who remain "actively involved in numerous Indian-sponsored terrorist activities in the area".
articles.content:
Two terrorists belonging to Indian-proxy were killed after intense fire exchange in Balochistan’s Kachhi district, military’s media wing said on Friday.

articles.title: Ireland v Senegal: Kasey McAteer and Jack Taylor make first Irish starts
articles.description: Ireland take on the might of Senegal in a friendly at the Aviva Stadium this evening (kick-off 7.45pm).
articles.content:
Kasey McAteer and Jack Taylor will make their first Irish starts in tonight's friendly against Senegal, while Adam Idah will lead the line with Troy Parrott and Evan Ferguson benched.

articles.title: Hunter Biden drops lawsuit against Fox News
articles.description: Hunter Biden on Friday dropped a second lawsuit that accused the right-wing network of unlawfully airing sexually explicit images of him.
articles.content:
Washington CNN —
Hunter Biden on Friday dropped a lawsuit against Fox News that accused the conservative network of unlawfully airing sexually explicit images of him.

articles.title: DeBoer fired as Stars coach after 3 seasons
articles.description: Led Dallas to Western Conference Final in each but 'new voice is needed'
articles.content:
Pete DeBoer was fired as coach of the Dallas Stars on Friday.

articles.title: NASA Mars Orbiter Spots Volcano Above Morning Clouds
articles.description: Arsia Mons, an ancient Martian volcano, was captured before dawn on May 2, 2025, by NASA's 2001 Mars Odyssey orbiter while the spacecraft was studying
articles.content:
Arsia Mons, an ancient Martian volcano, was captured before dawn on May 2, 2025, by NASA's 2001 Mars Odyssey orbiter while the spacecraft was studying the Red Planet's atmosphere, which appears here as a greenish haze. NASA/JPL-Caltech/ASU

articles.title: Lowry remains on the charge in Canada
articles.description: Shane Lowry added a second-round 68 to his opening 64 and is currently in a share of fifth spot on eight under at the RBC Canadian Open.
articles.content:
Shane Lowry added a second-round 68 to his opening 64 and is currently in a share of fifth spot on eight under at the RBC Canadian Open.
